title: Advanced Course for Enhancing Collaboration Competencies between Higher Education Instructional Designers and Faculty

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Course for Establishing Collaborative Relationships Between Instructional Designers and Educators, Including Microlearning Content Production and Feedback System Operation Using Mobile Devices

learning_goals: Learners can design a collaborative goal-setting process between instructional designers and instructors using the Collaborative Mapping Model (CMM) framework.
Learners can apply at least three structured communication strategies for effective interaction with faculty in mobile learning environments.
When developing microlearning content for social studies, it is feasible to integrate subject matter experts' domain knowledge with instructional designers' technical expertise.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
